text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Kogane!
Are you here?

Producer!
What's up~?

I received a new job offer,
and I wanted to tell you about it quickly.

Tell me, tell me~!
What kind of job is it~?

We'll have to discuss the details back at the office,
but for today, I'll give you a brief overview...

Got it, got it~
So, what's the gist~?

Haha, alright.
It's a photo shoot job.

It's supposed to evoke a sense of travel and adventure,
with streets filled with exotic vibes...

Oh~... Sounds amazing~...
Wait, exotic...?

Haha, not exactly exotic, but an exotic atmosphere.
It's all about setting the right mood, you know?

Yeah~ I get it~!
Looking forward to that exotic atmosphere~...!

I wonder what kind of city it'll be...!
Gotta do my best for the shoot~...!

Yeah, when we get back, we'll confirm the details.
I'll support you with everything I've got.
And someday...

(If Kogane flies off into the worldâ€”...
I might end up letting go of her hand.)
Hmm, what's wrong~?

......Oh, if you're aiming for the world, you'll need a passport~.
Do you have one, Producer~?

! ...Ah, yes, I do.
It's all good anytime...!
